mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pub_approve_result a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.prj_code like '%'||#{prjCode}||'%' '%'+#{prjCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjCode}, '%')
AND a.prj_name like '%'||#{prjName}||'%' '%'+#{prjName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjName}, '%')
AND a.approve_item_label like '%'||#{approveItemLabel}||'%' '%'+#{approveItemLabel}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{approveItemLabel}, '%')
AND a.approve_dept like '%'||#{approveDept}||'%' '%'+#{approveDept}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{approveDept}, '%')
AND convert(VARCHAR(10), a.approve_date, 120) >= convert(VARCHAR(10), #{startDate}, 120)
AND convert(VARCHAR(10), a.approve_date, 120) <= convert(VARCHAR(10), #{endDate}, 120)
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM pub_approve_result a
a.del_flag = '0' AND prj_code = ( SELECT TOP 1 a.prj_code FROM dbo.pub_approve_result a LEFT JOIN dbo.TBProjectInfo p ON a.prj_num = p.PrjNum WHERE p.PKID = #{pkid})
ORDER BY a.approve_date DESC
